    • getAndStartAvroGenericStoreClient

      default <K, V> AvroGenericStoreClient<K,V> getAndStartAvroGenericStoreClient(String storeName, VeniceStoreClientFactory.ClientConfigUpdater configUpdater)
      create a generic client along with customized client configs. This is only for sophisticated use cases. Do not use it if you are not familiar with these configs. e.g. client = veniceStoreClientFactory.getAndStartAvroGenericStoreClient(storeName, (config) -> config.setVsonClient(true));
